div.head: 外腎搐縮
div.div: the external kidneys are pulled in and shrink

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the external kidneys are pulled in and shrink

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with luan suo 卵縮 , egg shrinkage, i.e. shrinkage of the testicles. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 8: 小腹緊痛，外腎搐縮 , “The lower abdomen is tight and aches. The external kidneys are pulled in and shrink ”.
